name: Rocket!
description:
This is an arcade style space shooter game, with heavy influences from the classic Atari game Asteroids as well as the gameplay fun and challenge of a Bullet Hell / Shoot Em Up. As you shoot down asteroids and fire on various enemy ships, you will gain various resources you will need to upgrade your ship with more powerful weapons and various upgrades. Don't forget to avoid space anomalies like black holes and supernovas!

Work toward upgrading your ship each time you play. Each play through builds up resources you can use to power up your ship, allowing you to score higher and explore further. Maximize your ship’s power to rank high on the online leaderboards!

Local Co-Op and Versus Modes



Got an extra controller and a friend nearby? Check out the local co-op! Just pop in that second controller while playing and your buddy will join in on the fun. Can you both survive the depths and get a high score? Or, battle it out to see who will come out on top! Up to 5 players can play together.

This game is perfect for Steam's Remote Play Together as well! Invite your friend to play through the magic of Steam without being in the same room!

Online Co-Op and Versus Modes



Upgraded your ship? Time to travel beyond the dimensions into the Online Realm and check out the various game modes online. You can play Co-Op with friends and work together to survive the challenging levels. Not looking for teamwork but wanting to battle it out? Check out the Online Versus Modes and battle it out with friends and strangers!

Features



  • Three Challenging Arcade Modes
  • Ship Upgrades
  • Local Co-Op / Versus Modes
  • Online Co-Op / Versus Modes
  • Leaderboards
  • Wallpaper Mode
